name: Cramorant
description: The Gulp Pokémon. This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

abilities.name: Gulp Missile
abilities.description: May Grapple as a bonus action after completing either Surf or Dive. As a bonus action, may launch a creature grappled by you up to 15ft, dealing fall damage equivalent to the distance launched.
